Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: History | Housing/Building | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)

The House the 50s Built takes a look at the science behind the inventions and innovations that transformed the way we used to live, and helped to catapult the post-war country into the modernity of 1950s Britain. Professor Brendan Walker takes a look at the ingenuity and life-changing technology behind the inventions that took a drab Britain and launched it, under its new young Queen Elizabeth II, into a Technicolor world of the future.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31731)
